page.title: 14CHASE CROSS SCHOOL
page.content: "We left for Chase Cross at 9.30a.m. to ask the Headteacher some questions and to look around the school.Two students took us to Mr Steward's office where we sat down and began to ask our questions." The school stands in 38 acres,was built in 1948 to hold 650 boys and 530 girls.They were mixed in 1973.Today there were 1300 pupils,with 65 teachers. Styles of clothes have changed, most of the pupils are allowed to wear stylish shirts and jackets.The sports the students participate in have also changed,with rock climbing,badminton and tennis popular.In fact they play a much greater number of games than ever before.
